content:
Vicki Baugh works the ball down low against Porsha Phillips of Georgia on Monday Feb PERIOD  PERIOD With a  win over the Lady Bulldogs the Lady Vols clinched the regular season SEC Championship remaining perfect in conference play with only two games remaining in the regular season PERIOD

No PERIOD  Tennessee had an outright SEC regularseason championship up for grabs on Monday night PERIOD

With the No PERIOD  Georgia Lady Bulldogs visiting ThompsonBoling Arena the Lady Vols claimed that title  and they did it in style PERIOD

Tennessee used a dominating yet balanced performance to outman visiting Georgia  on Monday night grabbing the outright regularseason SEC title along the way PERIOD

 Tennessee coach Pat Summitt said PERIOD 

Meighan Simmons led UT   SEC with  points and Taber Spani and Shekinna Stricklen each added  PERIOD Tennessee shot  percent  from the field while holding Georgia to  percent shooting on the night PERIOD

Jasmine James paced Georgia   with  points PERIOD

Summitt said the regularseason title is always the understood goal before tournament time PERIOD

 Summitt said PERIOD We want to stay that way.We talked about it as a staff and associate head coach Holly Warlick really felt in the end that that would be our best defenseI think it was clearly our best defense PERIOD Our size and our length made a big difference.I think just from the past couple of games our depth and our bench has really really stepped upI think today with the different lineups weve all started to build a chemistry with each other.I didnt expect itAnd I just know I have to thank my teammates.I think just battling the boards the way we didOverall it was a pretty complete effort on the part of our team PERIOD We had only  turnovers and the bench gave us  points PERIOD



The Lady Vols travel to Oxford Miss. to take on Ole Miss on Thursday at  p.m PERIOD

Live Pink Bleed Orange

The contest served as UTs  game for breast cancer awareness with the Lady Vols donning special pink jerseys PERIOD The game had added meaning for those within the Tennessee family as former Lady Vol player Melissa McCrayDukes lost her battle with breast cancer on Dec PERIOD  PERIOD She was  years old PERIOD
